attributes.action: create a new border police force for the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the problems that the french are having with illegal immigrants camping and using France as the last step before the UK would it not be fair to replace the current immigration policies for a designated police unit to eradicate and investigate all attempts at illegal entry into this country showing the French that the UK is not taking their problems off their hands but leading by example.
